hadiths.text: A tradition similar to the one narrated above has also been transmitted by Abu Hurairah through a different chain of narrators. This version does not mention the lower garment and iron ring. He (the Prophet) said:How much do you memorize from Qur'an? He said: Surat al-Baqarah or the one that follows it. He said: Stand up and teach her twenty verses: she is your wife

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي التَّزْوِيجِ عَلَى الْعَمَلِ يُعْمَلُ
chapter.eng-name: On The Dowry Being Some Actions That He Must Perform
